entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
